bibl.title: What's Your Position? Using Multi-Dimensional Scaling (MDS) and Geographical Information Systems (GIS) for Locating Ancient Settlements in the Meris of Polemon / Graeco-Roman Fayum.
bibl.note: 1. Introduction. - 2. Data and Source Criticism. - 3. MER(ry) Spiders and Centroids. - 4. Results and Discussion. - 5. Conclusion. - Pp. 212-213: Appendix 1. Ptolemaic Sources. Papyri used to compile the matrix; - 214: Appendix 2. Ptolemaic Incidence Matrix.
bibl.seg: MUELLER Katja, What's Your Position? Using Multi-Dimensional Scaling (MDS) and Geographical Information Systems (GIS) for Locating Ancient Settlements in the Meris of Polemon / Graeco-Roman Fayum.

1. Introduction. - 2. Data and Source Criticism. - 3. MER(ry) Spiders and Centroids. - 4. Results and Discussion. - 5. Conclusion. - Pp. 212-213: Appendix 1. Ptolemaic Sources. Papyri used to compile the matrix; - 214: Appendix 2. Ptolemaic Incidence Matrix.
